item.title: security: ​​Securing critical infrastructure: Why Europe’s risk-based regulations matter
item.description:
The article explains how new European Union risk-based legislation helps CISOs strengthen cybersecurity for critical infrastructure by encouraging organizations to assess and prioritize risks, align controls with regulatory expectations, and build more resilient systems.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: At-cost data transfer between Azure and an external endpoint
item.description:
Azure has made at-cost data transfer generally available in Europe, allowing customers and CSP partners to pay only the underlying cost for internet data transfers between Azure and external endpoints.

  • Source: Azure Updates
